name: Mind Mysteries - a Curious Game
blurb: Mind Mysteries is loosely based on real crime case files, and addresses the neuroscience of eyewitness testimony.

rewards.reward: Access to all the project updates, knowing you've helped to make the world a better place and our heartfelt thanks!

All of the above plus base game and level/module 1 which includes the Scientists Office hidden object search, Experiment 1 story line, crime story from victim's perspective with stress as a factor in witness ID, arrest and incarceration stories from the perspective of the wrongly accused/convicted, puzzles with neuroscience themes, puzzles with legal themes, legal story from perspective of the defense attorney related to legal issues dealing with stress as a factor in wrongful eyewitness ID.  Plus your name in credits as a game supporter on the Mind Mysteries web page.

All of the above plus digital download of (your choice) the 3D Salt Water Fish Tank or the DNAtrix screen saver (from the scientist's office) from Unique3DScreenSavers.com. Screen saver will be delivered in November 2011.
All of the above plus your name in game credits as a key supporter.

Same as $25 reward plus one tasteful, non-selectable image or product placement (approved by us) of your choice in one hidden object game location.  Note: product placement refers to an image of your product (for businesses), or cat, ferret, spouse, friend, logo, symbol or the like. You must own or have permission to use the image. The image(s) will appear in one or more hidden object search area(s). A non-selectable image is one that is static in a hidden object search area.  Makes a great gift for  loved one.

Same as $25 reward plus one tasteful, SELECTABLE image or product placement (approved by us) of your choice in one hidden object game location.  Note: product placement refers to an image of your product (for businesses), or cat, ferret, spouse, friend, logo, symbol or the like. You must own or have permission to use the image. The image(s) will appear in one or more hidden object search area(s). A selectable image is one that can be chosen by the game player in a hidden object search area.  Makes a great gift for  loved one.

2,500 unit distribution license for the base game and level/module 1 (awarded to the school, non-profit or defense attorney of your choice). Can be used for education in schools, fund-raising or possibly jury edification.
Same as $25 reward plus your name in game credits as co-producer of level/module 1,

Same as $25 reward plus be a game character. You will need to provide images of yourself against a blue-screen background in a variety of relevant poses. Available characters are male or female prosecuting attorney, male or female victim and male wrongly accused. Final choice of character will be ours but we will work with you to accommodate your preferences.
Same as $25 reward plus name in game credits as executive producer of level/module 1
